thread.section_title: Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Always a great stay! Always.
thread.title_full: Always a great stay! Always. - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Robert D
title: Always a great stay! Always.
text: We've been to the Casablanca quite a few times and it always impresses. The rooms are relatively small, but always well appointed, clean, comfortable and quiet. The staff are excellent from the check in to the reception to the breakfast and td to check-out. The location is great too. It has the feel of a very nice European hotel.
